checkSignatures(bytes32,bytes).details: Checks whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data, hash. Will revert otherwise.

params.dataHash: Hash of the data (could be a message hash or transaction hash)
params.signatures: Signature data that should be verified.

disableModule(address,address).details: Disables the module `module` for the Safe.

params.prevModule: Previous module in the modules linked list.

enableModule(address).details: Enables the module `module` for the Safe.

execTransactionFromModule(address,uint25.details: Allows a Module to execute a Safe transaction without any further confirmations.

execTransactionFromModuleReturnData(addr.details: Allows a Module to execute a Safe transaction without any further confirmations and return data.

isModuleEnabled(address).details: Returns if an module is enabled

returns._0: True if the module is enabled

nonce().details: Returns the nonce to be used for Safe transactions
